Html:
Hi, first sorry because my english is no long.

I've a problem when i export from MySql to xlsx.

I use 01simple-download-xlsx.php. I export succesfully and open the document with excel, but if in the cell exist one slash ("), when i save the excel document like Tab Delimited Text, more slashes appear.

Excel dont take text format in the cells where exist text, excel takes "general" format, maybe its the problem, dont know....

Why if i have one slash in a cell, excel write more slashes when i save the xlsx document like Tab Delimited Text ?

If somebody can help me......

Thanks and excuse my english. I hope you can understand me.
